text: Don't worry! I think you can turn notifications on at the side of the screen (if you're using a web browser on a computer) There's a Notification Preferences menu>>>

But also, it's ok to be slow, I'm happy for you to fit me in anytime you can, unless you fancy something a little more structured? My days are often very different (away at meetings, or chained to my PC animating, or teaching etc) so I can be flexible for you :slightly_smiling_face:
